cause.description:
While your on a cruise with you family and you see a dolphin swimming with its family you cant help but wonder what beautiful creatures they are ; but what you dont know is that hundreds or thousands of dolphins are killed everyday . They get caught in nets or they die of heartattacks . These pretty creatures deserve so much more than that <3 for more info : http://youtube.com/watch?v=4Zk5lKa2tHQ&mode=related&search=
watch it only if your not grossed out by blood (:
save the dolphins and hang onto your balloons too ! <3
1. Leave the dolphins alone
cause.name: Save the Dolphins
